value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24279v1", "title": "Toward the effective 2-topos", "summary": "A candidate for the effective 2-topos is proposed and shown to include the\neffective 1-topos as its subcategory of 0-types.", "main_category": "math.CT", "categories": "math.CT,math.LO", "published": "2025-03-31T16:23:47Z"}
